entry.content:
ruby This is a rake task file... task :load_errors => :environment do AirbrakeError.import_from_airbrake end

In heroku I would run this: ``` ♕ heroku run rake load_errors

NOT

♕ heroku run rake task bandaid ```

entry.title: Rake
entry.content:
Rake - Rake lets you define a dependency tree of tasks to be executed. - Rake tasks are loaded from the file Rakefile - Rails rake tasks live under railties/lib/tasks - You can put your own tasks under lib/tasks

Useful Rake Tasks ```

db:migrate
db:sessions:create
doc:app
doc:rails
log:clear
rails:freeze:gems
rails:freeze:edge
test (default task)
stats

```
